title: Ultimate Cinematic OST
description: Elevate your project with 'Ultimate Cinematic OST,' featuring 70 royalty-free tracks perfect for creating epic, emotional, and dynamic cinematic soundscapes.
longDescription:
Preview: Ultimate Cinematic OST music pack for unreal engine (youtube.com)


Introducing the "Ultimate Cinematic OST," a masterfully curated collection of music tracks designed for filmmakers and game developers seeking to enrich their projects with epic, cinematic soundscapes. This pack features 70 royalty-free tracks of high-quality, dynamic music that captures a range of emotions, from heroic themes to haunting melodies. 🎼🎬


⭐ All 70 tracks are royalty-free. ❤️


Elevate your cinematic projects with this versatile music pack, where each track is crafted to bring depth and grandeur to your storytelling. Whether you're creating an intense battle scene or a poignant moment, "Ultimate Cinematic OST" provides the perfect audio backdrop. 🌟🎥
technicalDetails:
Features:


Number of Audio Wavs: 70

Number of Audio Cues: 70

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/Stereo

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: ~ 1 hour and 50 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
